results.title: Compound Danshen Dripping Pill inhibits hypercholesterolemia/atherosclerosis-induced heart failure in ApoE and LDLR dual deficient mice via multiple mechanisms
results.text_hl: CDDP or CDDP plus a low dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ inhibited @DISEASE_Heart_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D006335 @@@heart injury@@@ by multiple actions including anti-@<m>DISEASE_Heart_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@myocardial dysfunction@@@ and anti-@DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@.

results.title: Utilization of an Industry Byproduct, Corymbia maculata Leaves, by Aspergillus terreus to Produce Lovastatin
results.text_hl: Due to its ability to lower @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ levels, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ is a leading drug for the prevention of @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@strokes@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@heart disease@@@: it also lowers the incidence of @DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@neurodegenerative diseases@@@.

results.title: A liposomal formulation of simvastatin and doxorubicin for improved cardioprotective and anti-cancer effect.
results.text_hl: In @SPECIES_7955 @@@zebrafish@@@ larvae, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Sim@@@ treatment reduced @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@Dox@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@cardiac affection@@@, and the liposomes did not induce any sign of @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@Dox@@@-induced @DISEASE_Cardiotoxicity @DISEASE_MESH:D066126 @@@cardiotoxicity@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin relieves myocardial ischemia/reperfusion injury in rats through hedgehog signaling pathway.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Sim@@@ significantly alleviated I/R-induced @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@cardiac dysfunction@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ and increased EF (%) and FS (%) (p<0.05).

results.title: Endothelial Klf2-Foxp1-TGFbeta signal mediates the inhibitory effects of simvastatin on maladaptive cardiac remodeling
results.text_hl: These results suggest that EC-@GENE_KLF2 @GENE_16598 @@@Klf2@@@ might be important in mediating the protective effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on TAC-induced @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@cardiac dysfunction@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin cardioprotection in cyclophosphamide-induced toxicity via the modulation of inflammasome/caspase1/interleukin1beta pathway.
results.text_hl: The current study aimed to investigate the protective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@) against @CHEMICAL_Cyclophosphamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003520 @@@CYC@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@heart damage@@@ and evaluate different mechanisms involved in mediating this effect, including the inflammasome/@GENE_CASP1 @GENE_25166 @@@caspase1@@@/@GENE_IL1B @GENE_24494 @@@interleukin1beta@@@ (@GENE_IL1B @GENE_24494 @@@IL1beta@@@) pathway and @GENE_NOS3 @GENE_24600 @@@endothelial nitric oxide synthase@@@ (@GENE_NOS3 @GENE_24600 @@@eNOS@@@). 36 @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were randomly assigned to one of four groups: a control group that received only vehicles, a @CHEMICAL_Cyclophosphamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003520 @@@CYC@@@ group that received @CHEMICAL_Cyclophosphamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003520 @@@CYC@@@ (150 mg/kg/day) i.p. on the fourth and fifth days, a @CHEMICAL_Cyclophosphamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003520 @@@CYC@@@+@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ group that received @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ (10 mg/kg/day) orally for 5 days and @CHEMICAL_Cyclophosphamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003520 @@@CYC@@@ (150 mg/kg/day) i.p. on the fourth and fifth days, and a @CHEMICAL_Cyclophosphamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003520 @@@CYC@@@+@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@+ Nitro- omega-L-arginine (@CHEMICAL_Nitroarginine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019335 @@@L-NNA@@@) group that received @CHEMICAL_Nitroarginine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019335 @@@L-NNA@@@ (25 mg/kg/day, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ (10 mg/kg/day) orally for 5 days and @CHEMICAL_Cyclophosphamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003520 @@@CYC@@@ (150 mg/kg/day) i.p. on the 4th and 5th days.

citations.NLM: Refaie MM, El-Hussieny M, Bayoumi AM, Shehata S, Welson NN, Abdelzaher WY. Simvastatin cardioprotection in cyclophosphamide-induced toxicity via the modulation of inflammasome/caspase1/interleukin1beta pathway. Hum Exp Toxicol. 2022 Jan-Dec;41():9603271221111440. PMID: 35762198
